mapper.select: select p_id,p_name,p_price,p_canBuy,p_canRent,p_soldCount,p_recommand, p_category,p_mainImg,p_subImg,p_regdate from product order by p_id
mapper.insert: insert into product(p_id, p_name, p_price, p_canBuy, p_canRent, p_category, p_mainImg, p_subImg, p_view, p_content) values(#{p_id},#{p_name},#{p_price}, #{p_canBuy}, #{p_canRent}, #{p_category}, #{p_mainImg}, #{p_subImg}, #{p_view}, #{p_content})
mapper.update: update product set p_id = #{p_id}, sal = #{sal} where p_name = #{p_name}
